snippet.title: Milkmaid of the Milky Way - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Out now on Steam, App Store and Google Play Store!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/544970
https://itunes.apple.com/app/milkmaid-of-the-milky-way/id1163483480?mt=8
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.machineboy.milkmaid

This is a 90s style point-and-click adventure puzzle game in rhyme, set in 1920's Norway. You play Ruth, a young woman who lives on a remote farm in a faraway fjord. Her parent's have passed and life is tough, and soon mysterious things start happening to her and her cows. And then one day a giant, golden ship appears in the sky!

Milkmaid of the Milky Way is a game filled with wonder, puzzles and a story about finding your true place in the universe.

Play it now on PC, Mac, iPad, iPhone or Android!

Official website: http://milkmaidgame.com

Made by: Norwgian one-man-team, indie developer Mattis Folkestad, aka machineboy.
